coin_earnings_cards.estimated_tooltip: Estimated earnings are based on the past 24 hours on our pool (luck excluded).

mined_coins_section.title: Coins we mine
mined_coins_section.description: Flexpool is a Multi-Coin mining pool, which means that you can mine multiple coins on Flexpool.

eth.title: About Ethereum
eth.description: Ethereum is a worldwide computer created to power Decentralized Applications known as Smart Contracts.

etc.title: About Ethereum Classic
etc.description: Ethereum Classic maintains the original, unaltered history of the Ethereum network.

xch.title: About Chia
xch.description: Chia is a programmable cryptocurrency focused on the eco-friendly way of securing the blockchain.

btc.title: About Bitcoin
btc.description: Bitcoin is the world's first cryptocurrency that has introduced the concept of blockchain and peer to peer internet money.

zil.title: About Zilliqa
zil.description: Zilliqa is a new blockchain platform that is designed to securely scale in an open, permissionless distributed network.

calculator.title: Income Calculator
calculator.title_tooltip: The Estimated Income is calculated based on the 24-hour average network difficulty and the 24-hour average block reward. This calculation does not include Stale and Invalid shares.

item_1.title: Lightning speed
item_1.description: We use worldwide high-performance server clusters powered by superfast software designed to handle a tremendous amount of miners concurrently mining on our pool.

item_2.title: Just Better
item_2.description: You can forget your poor mining experience. Flexpool is backed by an expert team and excellent support that is always happy to help!

iron_testnet_airdrop.title: Iron Fish Testnet Pool Mega Airdrop Announcement
iron_testnet_airdrop.desc:
Earn a portion of our US$10,000 airdrop for mining on our testnet/mainnet Iron Fish pool from April 17 to April 23.

Details are in the announcement.

etc_promo.title: üéâ Ethereum Classic (ETC) one-week 0% fee event
etc_promo.desc: To address one of the largest pools shutting down, we have lowered the Ethereum Classic (ETC) pool fee to 0% for one week to welcome customers looking for a replacement, effective starting from May 31st.
